body.description: Product Description A paraben free and unscented lotion designed to give the therapist a quality lotion at a great price, everyday! Enhanced with Aloe, Chamomile and calendula extracts. Gallon. Ingredients: Filtered Water, Organic Aloe Vera Gel, Octyl Palmitate, Cetyl Alcohol, Triethanolamine, Propylene Glycol, Tocopherol (Natural Vitamin E), Calendula Extract, Allantoin, Chamomile Extract, Glyceryl Stearate, Stearic Acid, Cosmocil CQ (Antimicrobial). Manufacturer Contact Information 9143459300

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Soothing Touch began around 1977, in a small garage in Los Angeles, California. The late Yogi Bhajan (Founder) was a Kundalini Yoga teacher and master from India who had moved to the West to teach yoga, meditation, and healthy eating habits. His students were from all walks of life. In their quest to live a healthy Ayurvedic lifestyle, Yogi Bhajan provided his students with a collection of ancient Ayurvedic formulas for oil blends that had been used for centuries in India. The massage market valued a high quality oil blend for massage as the popularity of holistic products grew in the United States, and thus Soothing Touch became one of the trusted massage product manufacturers in the United States.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast and good product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Deep tissue perfect!
reviews.reviewText: This product is awesome it has an excellent glide. Not greasy, floral scented, and applies smooth with ease. I definitely recommend this lotion it is great quality for an inexpensive product. Unlike cream, or oil I feel like this is way easy… as far as clean up goes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable brand and products
reviews.reviewText: I appreciate the value I use it for work so I have tried alot of different brands of lotion this one is my go to

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done!
reviews.reviewText: It’s pretty good, while I have had better lotions in my 13 years in massage therapy but it’s not bad for the price. The scent is a little weird but can be covered up with essential oils. It’s a little bit of a slightly thinner texture than the average lotion. In general a cream is better for winter due to the drier skin. So it’s not the most ideal for winter, just because you’ll use more, but for the summer it’s perfect. Either way it works just fine and that’s what matters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this lotion. It’s thin enough to provide a good glide for clients but doesn’t dry too quickly if you go into deeper tissue work after your warming up the area. I don’t have any issues with the consistency being too thin or too thick. Totally unscented and it works really well for mixing with essential oils for aromatherapy massage.My clients also say they don’t feel overly greasy after their session as the day goes on which I’m very happy about.Can’t argue with the price and I’m shocked at how amazing this is. It’s such a solid massage lotion and I will use this forever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not enough glide for massage
reviews.reviewText: This lotion isn’t the right consistency for massage. But if you mix in a little oil it will become more slippery and you can glide much better. It’s not horrible, but it’s definitely not good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific deal on terrific product!
reviews.reviewText: While this product didn’t get the best reviews for massage lotion, absorbed too quickly. Make it perfect for me! Terrific lotion without all the chemicals. Excellent price & I get a whole gallon for what I was paying for 12 oz! Can pump out what I need, add oils or scent & make it different when I want. It does absorb well & makes my skin so soft! Will definitely recommend to others!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Economic massage cream
reviews.reviewText: Amazing! And delivery was so quick. Thank you.
